rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: A welcoming North-facing entrance lobby with minimalistic Bohemian decor, incorporating earthy tones and vibrant textures as per Vastu principles for energy flow.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: An expansive living area blending Bohemian aesthetics with modern furniture. Large windows on the North side enhance natural light and maintain Vastu balance.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A functional kitchen with an open layout adjoining the living area; designed with eco-friendly materials and vibrant Bohemian accents.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room for a seamless flow between social spaces. Decor elements include artistic bohemian touches that adhere to Vastu guidelines for prosperity.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Compact yet modern guest bathroom designed with minimal Bohemian decor and efficient storage solutions.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: A dedicated private gym area that doubles as a versatile space for fitness and relaxation. Designed in line with Vastu by ensuring proper directional alignment and energy flow.

openings.name: North Entrance
openings.description: A North-facing entrance that aligns with Vastu principles for positive energy influx. Incorporates sustainable design elements such as natural stone finishes.

openings.name: Living Room Windows
openings.description: Large windows on the North wall to maximize natural light while maintaining privacy and aesthetic appeal with Bohemian window treatments.

openings.name: Kitchen Ventilation Opening
openings.description: Strategically placed for optimal air circulation in the kitchen area. Designed to maintain balance as per Vastu guidelines.
